about_the_game:
Explore the mysteries that Maenovan, and the communities surrounding it offer with friends in this suspenseful indie horror game.

Run, Hide or Fight

Work cooperatively with friends, or play solo and try to accomplish your mission while forces work to stop you. With dynamically changing gameplay, you can be sure that every time you play a match, you will face different struggles. 

Survive Your Own Mind

Can you make it out before your sanity tears you apart?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8 / 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or better
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or AMD equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: A deep mystery shrouds Maenovan Valley in darkness. Is it a simple viral outbreak, or is something more sinister pulling the strings? Uncover the truth with friends in this co-operative suspenseful indie horror game.
